files.description: Deterministic CLI script that loads seed reference data, enforces required fields and tagging rules, performs deduplication, and writes canonical outputs/bibliography_system.md and outputs/references.bib.
Seed bibliography dataset (10–20 entries) with required fields plus type tags (seminal/survey/textbook) and topic tags used by the build script.

SUMMARY:Wrote a 15-entry, tagged seed bibliography YAML with required fields for deterministic bibliography generation.

FILE_WRITTEN:data/seed_references.yaml
DIR_STATE:["data/seed_references.yaml"]

missionDescription: Create ./outputs/bibliography_system.md (workflow: required fields, tagging, dedup) and ./outputs/references.bib with 10–20 seed entries tagged by type (seminal/survey/textbook) and topic.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Directly advances the missing bibliography deliverables by requiring a documented bib workflow plus a seeded references.bib, enabling systematic citation management and reducing rework in later survey...
projectName: ./outputs/bibliography_system.md (workflow: required fields, tagging, dedup) and ./outputs/references.bib with 10–20 seed entries tagged by type (seminal/survey/textbook) and topic.
